name: B29 Synth
author: Tanner Jacobi, Martin Grant, Bob Shemyakin, Matthias Merzenich
comments: Original 54-glider synthesis found by Tanner Jacobi, 5 April 2015;   incremental reductions by Martin Grant and Matthias Merzenich,   using a new base still life synthesis by Bob Shemyakin. Current 27-glider synthesis completed 11 June 2015. http://conwaylife.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=1557&p=1853118531 http://conwaylife.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=1394&p=2033920339 http://conwaylife.com/wiki/B29
